root.name: ellipse()
root.description: Draws an ellipse (oval) in the display window. An ellipse with an equal width and height is a circle. The first two parameters set the location, the third sets the width, and the fourth sets the height. The origin may be changed with the ellipseMode() function.

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: int or float: x-coordinate of the ellipse

parameter.label: y
parameter.description: int or float: y-coordinate of the ellipse

parameter.label: width
parameter.description: int or float: width of the ellipse

parameter.label: height
parameter.description: int or float: height of the ellipse
